title: The default value set in list box of report parameter is lost after modifying the default value
description: The default value set in the list box of a report parameter is lost after modifying the default value.
OB: When modifying the default value of a report parameter in the list box, the originally set default value is lost.
SR: To reproduce the issue: 1. Create a new report parameter and set the Display type to List Box. 2. Input three values: 'aa', 'bb', 'cc', and set 'aa' as the default value. Click 'OK'. 3. Reopen the 'Edit Parameter' dialog and modify 'aa' to 'aaa'. Click 'OK' directly. 4. Reopen the 'Edit Parameter' dialog. 5. [Additional steps needed to reproduce the issue].
